thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 127 of 7354
thread.title: BC

author: BC
title: BC
text: I've been shopping with B&H for ten years or so and I have consistently found dealing with B&H to be pleasant and efficient. When it becomes necessary to return or exchange an item, the people are compatible and very nice to work with. It is always comfortable to work with B&H--no concerns about flim-flam, bait and switch or incorrect shipping. It's just always right, on time and reasonably priced. I look forward to working with B&H for another ten years.
